dataset_pseudo_time.title: Dataset pseudo time
dataset_pseudo_time.description: Time at which the dataset was pseudonymized. In ISO 8601 format.

source_dataset_path.title: Source dataset path
source_dataset_path.description: Path to the unpseudonymized dataset. Specified as a file path, URL or URI.

items.description: A pseudonymized variable in the dataset.

short_name.title: Short name
short_name.description: Physical name of the variable in the dataset. Should match the recommended short name.
short_name.$comment: Alphanumeric. Limited to a-z, A-Z, 0-9, - (hyphen) and _ (underscore)

data_element_path.title: Data element path
data_element_path.description: Path to one or multiple data element(s) in the dataset.
data_element_path.$comment: Only for use in heirarchical datasets. Use JsonPath dot-notation to specify the path.

stable_identifier_type.title: Stable identifier type
stable_identifier_type.description: Type of stable identifier the variable was mapped to prior to pseudonymization.
stable_identifier_type.$comment: Only relevant when the variable is mapped to a stable identifier.

stable_identifier_version.title: Stable identifier version
stable_identifier_version.description: Version of stable identifier the variable was mapped to prior to pseudonymization.
stable_identifier_version.$comment: Only relevant when the variable is mapped to a stable identifier.

encryption_algorithm.title: Encryption algorithm
encryption_algorithm.description: The encryption algorithm used to pseudonymize the variable.

encryption_key_reference.title: Encryption key reference
encryption_key_reference.description: Name of or reference to the encryption key used to pseudonymize the variable.

encryption_algorithm_parameters.title: Encryption algorithm parameters
encryption_algorithm_parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the encryption algorithm.

source_variable.title: Source variable
source_variable.description: Short name of the source variable
source_variable.$comment: Only relevant when this differs from the short name of the variable.

source_variable_datatype.title: Source variable data type
source_variable_datatype.description: Data type of the variable prior to pseudonymization.
